title.default: 🎄 Christmas and New Year special offers

message.default: During 2023-12-19 ~ 2024-01-02, for the Christmas and New Year, Pure Writer Pro (lifetime), originally priced at US$25(tax not included), is discounted to US$14.99(tax included!).
message.zh:
在 2023-12-19 ~ 2024-01-02 期间，纯纯写作 Pro（永久会员）现提供圣诞节与新年限时大幅降价优惠！

在纯纯写作 Pro 页面底部可查看最新优惠售价。
